amendment.description: Amendment sought to repeal the Million Theoretical Operations Per Second (MTOPS) based method for controlling computer exports.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report 108-122 to insert a new section providing for the repeal of MTOPS for computer export controls.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Dreier amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 207 - 217 (Roll no. 219).
